title: Ticket #2562: RFE: allow the root group "<none>" to be assigned an alternate name
description:
The root Accounting Group currently has its name fixed to "<none>", but there are possible use cases for allowing an admin to assign a different name, for example to enable something like this: 

NEGOTIATOR_ROOT_ACCOUNTING_GROUP_NAME = root
GROUP_PRIO_FACTOR_root = 10.0
remarks:
2011-Oct-19 14:51:10 by eje:
If this idea is implemented, it will be important to consider what to do if somebody tries this: 

NEGOTIATOR_ROOT_ACCOUNTING_GROUP_NAME = root
GROUP_QUOTA_root = 1

The above "GROUP_QUOTA_root = 1" would be ignored by the current code, and it would need to be forbidden, or ignored with a warning.

Generally, which acct grp attributes have well-defined semantics for "root" (<none>) and which don't would need to be documented and/or addressed in some way.
creator: eje
